programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: When Dr. Teresa Sievers is found murdered in her kitchen, detectives struggle to find any leads until an unexpected tip changes everything; the woman who helped investigators speaks out.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: After Tahereh Ghassemi disappears from the Louisiana home she shares with her adult son, detectives discover that she'd recently come into a great deal of money; the investigation reveals an astonishing plot with international implications.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: A woman finds herself on the wrong side of the law after she accuses her boyfriend of rape.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: A luxury car salesman is asked by a beautiful former client to plan a murder.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: When young mother and paramedic Annamarie Cochrane Rintala is found dead at the bottom of her basement stairs, it takes four trials and 13 years before justice is served.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: Convicted murderer Drew Peterson speaks out about the murder of his third wife and the disappearance of his fourth wife in his first network TV interview in more than a decade; insiders close to the case speak out, including Stacy Peterson's sister.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: As a murder victim's sisters dedicate themselves to finding the killer, an unexpected source turns the case upside down.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: A brilliant woman who rose from poverty and became a successful criminal defense attorney is murdered; investigators look into her clients and follow a bizarre string of clues.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: A model with a checkered past goes under cover to reveal the truth about a cold case involving a romantic getaway on a boat that ended with a woman being lost at sea.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: A woman accused of attempting to hire a hit man to kill her husband.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: When a California housewife is murdered in broad daylight, the suspected killer claims it was a burglary gone awry.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: The investigation into the death of a woman whose remains were found in her Frisco, Texas, garage leads detectives to a series of suspects with connections to the victim's complicated and secretive life.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: A bombshell more than a decade after the crime reignites the investigation into the death of Sarah Pagel's mother, who was killed when Sarah was 7.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: A man calls 911 to report that his pregnant wife has died by suicide; the case is closed until a suspicious house fire 24 years later leads police to question what really happened that day.
